metadata.Title: CVE-2020-25863 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.Description: In Wireshark 3.2.0 to 3.2.6, 3.0.0 to 3.0.13, and 2.6.0 to 2.6.20, the MIMEMultipart dissector could crash. This was addressed inepan/dissectors/packet-multipart.c by correcting the deallocation ofinvalid MIME parts.

criterions.comment: wireshark: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
